author: AJ Dellinger
title: Elon Musk Wants You to Use XChat for Your Next Signalgate
description: It features “Bitcoin-style” encryption, which isn't a thing.
content: Elon Musk announced on Sunday that starting soon, you will be able to chat with your friends, family, and war collaborators on X, the everything app. Now, you might be thinking, “I could already do t… [+3128 chars]
